entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 6 failing at Decompress large gzip text #64577
  • SuperPMI collect of benchmarks fails with "UnicodeEncodeError: 'charmap' codec can't encode character '\ufffd' in position 670361" #64575
    7.0.0
  • Build crossgen with NativeAOT and trimming #64571
    7.0.0
  • Mono problems with double to nuint conversion #64570
  • EventSource source generator should mark both source and IL as autogenerated #64563
  • Interop source generator should insert [GeneratedCodeAttribute] #64562
  • Build failure: "...nativeaot\Runtime\Full\AsmOffsets.cs' could not be found" #64557
  • [QUIC] Update to msquic 2.0 #64554
    7.0.0
  • [WASM] main.js missing in wasm-aot performance runs #64553
    7.0.0
  • UdpClient hangs when Receive is waiting and gets a Close() in macos #64551
  • Arm64: Inserting upper vector restore in block having BBJ_EHFINALLYRET #64550
    7.0.0
  • WinformsControlsTest cannot be run under debugger in Visual Studio #64568
  • Add analyzer for StringBuilder[int] indexer #64545
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Tests Assert failure: fieldSize != (unsigned int)-1 #64544
  • Generated code should include [GeneratedCodeAttribute] and // <auto-generated/> #64541
  • File.CopyTo: experiment with truncation and pre-allocation #64539
    Future
  • DOTNET_ROOT alternative for Windows; hacky solution found #64538
    Future
  • Supporting netstandard2.x platform specific target frameworks is causing unreasonable pain #64536
  • JIT: Strange redunant 'cmp' in Unsafe.As<TFrom, TTo>() codegen #64532
    Future
  • compile dotnet runtime source "Microsoft.NETCore.App.Crossgen2.sfxproj" error fail. #64528
  • TryConvertIanaIdToWindowsId empy output on server #64526
    Future
  • Prevent placing ref fields on non-pointer boundaries #64520
    7.0.0

Closed

  • EXC_BAD_ACCESS in DacDbiInterfaceImpl::ResolveExactGenericArgsToken #64011
    7.0.0
  • Need some telemetry in createdump #8550
    Future
  • <MonoAOTCompiler/> fails on F# projects due to satellite assemblies #64269
    6.0.MAUI
  • JIT: Throw statement triggers: "has ldstr VM restriction" #53726
    7.0.0
  • .NET 6.0.2 #64529
  • Reducing minimum default size of .NET 6.0 app #64524
  • Regex ranges with unicode chars #64519
  • Runtime Exception in coreclr.dll (dotnet 5.0.13) #64323
  • SystemNative_CopyFile() should use copy_file_range() in Linux #30156
    7.0.0
  • Add Path.Exists -- to replace inefficient FileExists || DirectoryExists #21678
    7.0.0
  • Intermittent issues while executing "CoCreateInstance" to native c++ target #64516
  • Merge all of the inbox S.S.C.* libraries into one #55690
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [WIP][ILVerify] Reporting verification error on protected blocks with more than one handler #64582
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Use a simpler representation for array addresses after morph #64581
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • NativeAot: Allow disabling -pie flag #64580
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make the `EventSource` generator incremental et.al. #64579
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • With `build -subset help` output "macro" subset components #64578
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix LLC cache issue on Apple M1 #64576
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [wasm] Revert "Disable InspectVariableBeforeAndAfterAssignment test (#64546)" #64574
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Allow use of overloaded methods when using LoggerMessage #64573
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • [build] Move Mono API headers to src/native/include/mono-2.0 #64569
    area-Build-mono
  • Update Android to r23b image #64567
  • mono_get_generic_info_from_stack_frame fix for default interface methods #64566
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Update mac Helix queues #64565
  • Optimize the remaining awaitable types in S.P.C. #64564
    community-contribution
  • [AOT] Use `.short` directive instead of `.hword` #64561
    community-contribution
  • Minor cleanup for CryptoServiceProviders #64560
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Add alignment to mapped field stream #64559
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Explicit test for injecting scoped IServiceProvider (#63225) #64558
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Expand System.Runtime.InteropServices.NFloat to support the APIs required by Xamarin #64556
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix several remaining IL tests I missed in my assembly name cleanup #64555
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix for number of used frame infos during crossgen2 compilation #64549
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Override DisposeAsync in PipeWriterStream #64547
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • Remove unused variable, fix typos #64542
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Disable a few ECKeyFileTests on Android 31 and later #64533
    area-System.Security
  • Fix client-initiated renegotiation on OpenSSL 3.0+ #64531
    area-System.Net.Security
  • JIT: Import string.Empty as "" #64530
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Fixed debugger attachment to a project with special characters in the path. #64527
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix debugger initialization #64523
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr

Merged

  • Delete code related to CompilationRelaxations.NoStringInterning #64521
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable InspectVariableBeforeAndAfterAssignment test #64546
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Use Reference items instead of P2Ps for inbox libs #64508
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use stable outputs in illink targets #64160
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Add Android Maui Startup testing #64121
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • add missing test for scenario when destination file is larger than source file (it needs to be truncated) #64537
    area-System.IO, test enhancement, 7.0.0
  • Obtain pagesize from OS in PAL tests #64540
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Optimize path check to skip to if statement if result is false. #64525
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Subscribe the interop team to issues labeled for InteropServices #64548
    area-Infrastructure
  • Remove ARMv6 from all platformgroups, matching s390x #64535
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] Run debugger tests only in runtime-staging, as they are a bit #64503
    arch-wasm
  • Remove some StringBuilderCache usage from Corelib #64522
    area-Meta
  • Add array-fast path in Enumerable.Min/Max(int/long) #64470
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Fix EventSourceGenerator generated file extension #64534
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • [wasm] Initial templates implementation #63683
  • [wasm][debugger] Fixing getScriptSource when is an embedded source #64464
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix Issue #21678: Add Path.Exists -- to replace inefficient FileExists || DirectoryExists #64347
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • FileSystem.Unix: CopyFile: use copy_file_range on Linux. #64264
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 7.0.0

Updated

  • [wasm][debugger] Fixing race condition #64394
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Set wasm debugger log level at execution time. #64339
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Move DllImportGenerator to use DisableRuntimeMarshalling for its blittable classification #64279
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Expose Comment in ZipArchive and ZipArchiveEntry #59442
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Add NetCoreAppCurrent rid agnostic tfm to libs #64518
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Don't use Targets* helper properties in project properties #64500
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [WIP] [ILVerify] Recognize type equivalence of two types with `System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeIdentifierAttribute` #64413
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, Future
  • Add S.S.C.Cose with COSE Sign1 support #64461
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Move MacCatalyst to runtime-extra-platforms pipeline #64452
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • NativeAOT: ICustomMarshaller #62921
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Including FastFloat in parsing process #62301
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fix DNS cancellation deadlock #63904
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • Add almalinux support #62184
    area-Host
  • [release/6.0] Fix DateOnly and TimeOnly Formatting using interpolated strings #64460
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime, 6.0.x
  • Stop using `CLS_VAR` for "boxed statics" #63845
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Initial changes for emscripten 2.0.34 #62499
    area-Build-mono
  • Explicit test for injecting scoped IServiceProvider into scoped and transient services (#63225) #63226
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Implement support to Set Next Instruction Pointer. #64114
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Updating the x64 casting behavior to be IEEE 754 compliant and to use saturation for overflow #61761
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Fix generic method resolution in composite R2R images #64247
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [Mono] Add linux-x64 coop gc test run to runtime-staging #64468
  • [resubmit] BigInteger parsing optimization for large decimal string #55121
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Use hash size constants where applicable #64218
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • fix some test for FreeBSD #64426
    area-System.Net, os-freebsd, 7.0.0
  • Fix non-portable distroRID generation on Alpine Linux #62942
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [draft][wasm] InvokeJSFunctionByName #64062
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • vtable setup fix for generic default interface methods in mono runtime #64102
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Set language specific flags appropriately in mono #64454
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Unify reading from procfs to get network related information #63696
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • Implement TLS1.3 delayed client cert requests on Linux #64268
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • [wip] Run tests on newer Android #64341
    * NO MERGE *, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • StreamReader sync/async optimizations: ArrayPool, IndexOfAny, ValueStringBuilder #62552
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Remove unused private parameters in SPC #63015
    area-System.Runtime
  • NativeAOT ARM64 libraries testing #64373
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Move FabricBot generation scripts to dotnet/runtime #64324
    area-Meta
  • Improve incremental build times of the libraries subset #64000
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • [tests][eventpipe] Port over minimal code from Dotnet/Diagnostics to enable eventpipe tests on Android #64358
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • JIT: simple forward substitution pass #63720
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • NativeAOT: Guarded devirtualization #64497
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [6.0.200-preview.22055.15] `dotnet tool run ...` will "hang" if the requested tool is not installed #23687
  • `dotnet run` swallows Posix signals on Unix #23683
  • `dotnet store` doesn't set the Framework and Runtime options as required #23682
    6.0.3xx
  • Unable to rebuild deps.json if reference project rebuilt #23678
  • "dotnet publish" (Linux, MSBuild GenerateBundle task) does not include assembly metadata in PE binary for self-contained win-x64 console application #23671

PullRequests

Created

  • fix dotnet run infinite loop by rendering help explicitly #23688
    Area-Tools
  • Cherry pick build config changes #23686
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Cherry pick build config changes #23685
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #23532
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable additional test projects to run on helix #23381
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-31
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • Create unsigned-right-shift-operator.md proposal document #5711
  • Correct syntax in #line directive example #5710

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Move *OptionsMetadata types to EditorFeatures #59184
  • Consider moving AddImport implementation to Workspace layer #59179
  • Adding " is not smart anymore, actually it is pretty stupid because it adds "" when there is an ending quote in the string #59178
  • Capture source generator statistics #59176
  • Expose NameSyntax.GetUnqualifiedName #59175
  • IIncrementalGenerator doesn't support incremental builds #59174
  • <autogenerated>causes nullable variable to be incorrectly reported as "is not null" #59173
  • CS8604 false positive 'possible null reference argument' when null is excluded in a query. #59172
  • IOperation tree change for target-typed new is breaking analyzers in the wild #59171
    17.1

Closed

  • Update the code that computes effective severity for EditorConfig UX similar to #58461 #58462
    17.2
  • 'Simplify new expression (IDE0090)' should arguably _not_ be encouraged #59119
  • Nullability analysis could be improved after ReferenceEquals checks #59157

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge features/RawStringLiterals to main #59182
    Area-Compilers, Area-Infrastructure
  • Update to Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Testing 1.1.1-beta1.22081.4 #59181
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add fixer to convert normal (or verbatim) strings to raw strings. #59180
    Area-IDE
  • Remove netstandard1.3 from code base #59177
    Area-Infrastructure
  • QuickInfo and Completion options follow-up #59170
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Compact error codes #59183
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge the interpolated end tokens into a single token #59122
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #59162
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Updated

  • Add external access API for find usages #59144
    Area-IDE
  • Enable feature lightup on json strings (classification, bracematching, diagnostics). #59034
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Support Pattern Matching ReadOnlySpan<char> on constant string #44388
    Area-Compilers, Community, Compiler.Next
  • Make CompletionOptions global #59117
    Area-IDE
  • Use record param docs as property summary docs #58960
    Area-Compilers
  • Refactor ISyntaxInputNodes #58800
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Update publish data for 17.1 #59153
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Support declaration and emit of `required` members in source #58507
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Make sure Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Collections builds with net6.0 #57665
    Area-IDE
  • AddImportPlacementOptions #59028
    Area-IDE
  • [Draft] Don't block completion for items from unimported namespaces #59045
    Area-IDE
  • CompletionService refactoring and small tweaks to import completion #59125
    Area-IDE
  • Add IL verification with ILVerify in addition to PEVerify #37994
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only
  • Remove places where the compiler is swallowing exceptions #58870
    Area-Compilers
  • Rename options refactoring #58403
    Area-IDE
  • Move FunctionIdOptions to EditorFeatures #59166
    Area-IDE
  • Remove Roslyn.Hosting.Diagnostics.csproj #59167
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update incremental generator docs #58344
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, New Feature - Source Generators
  • BackgroundAnalysisScope enhancements #57172
    Area-Analyzers, Needs UX Triage
  • Handle nullable annotations on user defined operators and conversions #59169
    Area-Compilers
  • ✨ Implement SegmentedHashSet<T> #54574
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider aliasing user-secrets CLI command as dev-secrets #39897
  • Unexpected exception using WsFederation authentication with React SPA template #39896
  • SignalR HttpContext access #39894
  • Different behavior for guid constraint with Swagger in Controllers and Minimal APIs #39886
  • SignalR can't invoke server method from client with throttled connection #39885
  • Perf regression: endpoint #39883

Closed

  • Blazor WebAssembly doesn't load symbols for debugging #38413
    .NET 7 Planning
  • License template is used without applied year and contributors #34340
  • UseHttpLogging not working .NET 6 RC 1 #37577 and the answer You need to have information level logging for HttpLogging to show up, right now you're set at warning level #39701
  • Disconnect event takes 10 minutes to trigger #39666
  • Async minimal route handlers don't serialize child members #39856
  • Receiving error when invoking IDistributedCache.SetAsync: Wrong number of args calling Redis command From Lua script #39879
  • Blazor WASM Hot Reload fails with websocket error #39891
  • Publish Blazor WASM application to Azure App service fails #39869
  • ASP .NET Core Razor Page Data Annotations Localizations fail #39849
  • Starting the Server from WebApplicationFactory #39893
  • /_framework/aspnetcore-browser-refresh.js not found #39888
  • RedisCache update in .NET 6 breaks usage against older redis servers #38715
    6.0.2
  • Injecting IAccessTokenProvider failing when using custom AuthenticationStateProvider - Blazor Wasm #39304
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor server Safari fullscreen issue #39726
  • Document the public API for Static Web Assets #34976
    7.0-preview2
  • [WebAssembly hosted in .net core] Make scoped service session dependant #38764
    Discussions
  • Design proposal: Multiple same-named event handlers #39815
    7.0-preview2
  • Blazor Wasm Hosted App startup Project issue #39878
  • Blazor does not passes typeparam TItem into EventCallback through attribute [CascadingTypeParameter(nameof(TItem))] #39847
  • Duplicated client assemblies after publish #39884
  • Sections doesn't populate from partials. #39830
  • Minimize Blazor Server state stored per circuit #39882

PullRequests

Created

  • Reduce build steps in our pipelines #39899
  • Disable component governance in Linux_musl_x64_build #39898
    area-infrastructure
  • Update SDK to 7.0.100-preview.2.22078.1 #39895
    area-infrastructure
  • Proposal for how we handle more metadata for auth #39892
    area-security

Merged

  • Consistently serialize child members returned from route handlers #39858
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview2
  • Only call IsSelfSigned() once #39877
    area-security, community-contribution, 7.0-preview2
  • Add missing ConfigureAwait(false) to PolicyHttpMessageHandler #39874
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview2
  • Remove Interop build step #39553
    area-infrastructure, area-grpc, 7.0-preview2
  • Improve App build reliability and performance #39870
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview2
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `3d81736` to `28e1da2` #39887
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview2
  • [7.0-preview1] Update precedence of templates for 7.0 #39794
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc
  • [Blazor] JS root component registration #37180
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview2
  • Use ConfigureAwait(false) on ConnectionMultiplexerFactory #39865
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview2

Updated

  • Delay closing SignalR connections on shutdown #34438
    area-signalr
  • define RouteValuesAddress .ToString () #39753
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [SPA] Update NPM dependencies for dotnet 5 #39464
    area-mvc, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • [WIP] libnethost prototyping #39810
    area-runtime
  • [release/6.0] [SignalR] Only minify .min.js files #39859
    Servicing-consider, area-signalr, 6.0.x
  • Move CredScanSuppressions.json to root of repo #39780
    blocked, area-infrastructure

PullRequests

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Validate correct target for XAML/CSS injection and platform folder adjustments #4431
    6.0.300-preview.14
  • Showstopper for those that use MongoDB Realm nuget package (and maybe others) #4427
  • Getting issue when trying to open a new window #4426
  • MSB4018 The "XamlCTask" task failed unexpectedly. #4420
  • Slider size not displaying properly inside a Frame #4415
  • Linear gradient brushes throws an exception in XAML Editor. #4414

Closed

  • [Shell, WinUI] Shell Flyout Behavior Implementations #9806 #1627
  • NavigationPage.HasBackButton property not working in Windows 11 #4407
  • .NET MAUI Class Library project not generating Windows targeted library when built from the command line using dotnet build #4418
  • Re-introduce usage of upstream MacCatalyst API's when Available #3953
  • [Spec] Remove members marked with Obsolete attribute #21
    6.0.300-preview.14
  • The Onplatform condition does not work properly in MacCatalyst. #3758
  • Merging ResourceDictionary from referenced assembly via pack://application leads to compilation error #4398
  • [Bug] DISABLE_XAML_GENERATED_BREAK_ON_UNHANDLED_EXCEPTION when adding a CollectionView #1561
  • XamlG Errors need to be surfaced more clearly #4343

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix INativeViewHandler to return more expected NativeView #4432
  • Add an item group for all the platform folders #4430
  • [WinUI] Wire up the rest of the TabbedPage properties #4429
    6.0.300-preview.14
  • Remove Material Visual marker #4428
  • Don't force a min size of zero for controls #4422
  • Implement Cookies property in WebView #4419
    area/controls 🎮
  • [Windows] Implement Border properties in RadioButtonHandler #4416
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮

Merged

  • [Catalyst] Fix OnPlatform and OnIdiom on macOS #3763
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/Xaml </>, 6.0.200-preview.13
  • [X] add error diagnostics to XamlG sourceGen #4376
    area/Xaml </>, 6.0.200-preview.13
  • Append a special header to generated files #4413
    6.0.200-preview.13

Updated

  • Shell page dependency injection now uses IServiceProvider.GetService() #4281
    area/shell 🐢
  • Make sure all @(Compile) items appear in the Solution Explorer #4411
    6.0.200-preview.13
  • Move Xaml.VisualDiagnostics to Maui.Core #4333
    partner/ui-tools, 6.0.200-preview.13
  • [Windows] Set correct Idiom #4370
    area/Xaml </>, platform/windows 🪟
  • [Core] Implement IsReadOnly property in SearchBar #3391
    area/controls 🎮
  • [Core] Implement BackgroundImageSource in PageHandler #3396
    area/controls 🎮
  • [iOS] Implement VerticalTextAlignment property in Label #3714
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮
  • Implement InputView IsSpellCheckEnabled property #3729
    area/controls 🎮
  • iOS NavigationRend-andler #3969
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮
  • [Windows] CarouselViewHandler #4200
    platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃
  • [Blazor] Add missing RootComponentCollectionExtensions to Wpf and Maui #4384
  • Generate the Windows manifests as well #2704
    area/single project ☝️, platform/windows 🪟
  • Add CarouselView handlers on Controls [iOS] #3141

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cannot consume scoped servicefrom singleton #27326
  • EF bundle seems to not be properly passing --connection parameter #27325
  • EF Core migration's SQL script for computed column expression differs depending on the way the column is being handled #27323
  • Construct IDesignTimeDbContextFactory without first discovering all DbContext types #27322
  • Copy data across tables in bulk (INSERT ... SELECT) #27320
  • Bundle-Migration "failed to restore project" or "it was not possible to find any compatible framework version" #27317
  • When using temporal tables - property named PeriodEnd or PeriodStart has to be DateTime #27316
  • EF Core adds an Id column for foreign key relation although foreign key is provided explicitely #27315
  • Scaffold-DbContext runs successfully but does not create any models #27314

Closed

  • Update to Ubuntu1804 for docker based testing #27220
    7.0.0
  • EF Core 6, Invalid Generated SQL (JOIN Statement) (Big wrong result) #27312
  • Avoid automatic convert nested queries to joins #27267

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Humanizer.Core from 2.13.14 to 2.14.1 #27321
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • Update azure-pipelines.yml #27324
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Where does the build commit come from? #13149

PullRequests

Updated
